Single and Multi-line text, Text Styles, Text Editor

entry.p: Additional formats available with BricsCAD Communicator

row.entry: Full LISP Support (vl, vlr, vla and vlax)
CUI menu files support, with Diesel expressions

conbody.p: (1) You can manipulate dynamic block insertions but you cannot create dynamic block definitions.
(2) You can automatically apply geometric constraints but you cannot automatically apply a combination of geometric and dimensional constraints.
